Uses of Class
jgame.controller.ControlScheme

  • Packages that use ControlScheme 
    Package Description
    jgame.controller
    The jgame.controller package contains the JGame controller framework.

    • Uses of ControlScheme in jgame.controller

      Fields in jgame.controller declared as ControlScheme 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ControlScheme ControlScheme.ARROW_KEYS
      The control scheme using the arrow keys.
      private ControlScheme KeyboardLocationController.controlScheme
      The control scheme for this keyboard controller.
      private ControlScheme PointOrbitController.controlScheme
      The control scheme for this keyboard controller.
      static ControlScheme ControlScheme.IJKL
      The control scheme using the I, J, K, and L keys.
      static ControlScheme ControlScheme.WASD
      The control scheme using the W, A, S, and D keys.
      Constructors in jgame.controller with parameters of type ControlScheme 
      Constructor and Description
      KeyboardLocationController(ControlScheme controlScheme, double speed)
      Creates the controller with the given control scheme.
      KeyboardLocationController(ControlScheme controlScheme, double speed, boolean rotateToFollow, int rotationOffset)
      Creates the controller with the given parameters.
      PointOrbitController(ControlScheme controlScheme, double speed)
      Creates the controller with the given control scheme.
      PointOrbitController(ControlScheme controlScheme, double speed, boolean rotateToFollow, int rotationOffset)
      Creates the controller with the given parameters.
      PointOrbitController(ControlScheme controlScheme, double speed, java.awt.Point center)
      Creates the controller with the given control scheme, orbiting around the given point.
